{{Useless Function}}
'''Note:''' Use [[/countPlayersInTeam.md|countPlayersInTeam]] instead

This function get count [[/player.md|player]] in [[/team.md|team]].

==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">int getCountPlayerInTeam ( team )</syntaxhighlight>

===Arguments===
* '''team''': a [[/team.md|team]] to get count players in this team.

===Returns===
Returns ''int'' of count players.

==Code==
<section name="Function source" class="both" show="true">
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
function getCountPlayerInTeam ( team )
	assert ( isElement ( team ) and getElementType ( team ) == "team", "Bad argument @ getCountPlayerInTeam [ team expected, got " .. type ( team ) .. " ]" )
	local countPlayer = 0
	for _,v in ipairs ( getElementsByType ( "player" ) ) do
		if ( getPlayerTeam ( v ) == team ) then
			countPlayer = countPlayer + 1
		end
	end
	return countPlayer
end
</syntaxhighlight>
</section>
